body.p:
State of Kentucky
Jefferson Circuit Court
May Term 1865
May 23 1865

Commonwealth Plff
versus } Indict felony
Peter Belner Sr Deft

This day came again the Commonwealth by Attorney as the accused being in custody and the jury empanneled and sworn herein again appeared in the jury box and having heard the evidence upon oath returned into Court the following verdict: We of the jury find the accused Peter Belner Sen guilty of manslaughter as charged in the within indictment and say he shall be confined in the jail and penitentiary of this Commonwealth for the term of two years and recommend him to executive clemency

A Copy att
James P Chambers clk

Jefferson Cir Ct
vs
Peter Belner
Pardoned
